entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Net7 and Net8 Android projects with AndroidLibrary try to generate binding instead of add it as reference like Xamarin project does #19569
  • GraphicsView does not change the Background/BackgroundColor on Android #19568
  • [UItest] Windows Device Tests don't appear to be running full set of categories #19565
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Adding buttons to the title bar #19564
  • [testing] Run tests iOS and Android emulator tests on Hosted machines #19561
    Backlog
  • Shadow does not honour Styles #19560
  • Resizetizer generates incorrect images #19557
  • Android Systemfonts (light/black etc.) not working #19556
  • can't compile on vs for Mac with .net 8 due to missing supporting packages #19555
  • How to start a single UI test from the command line? #19554
  • Can't run the application on physical iOS device #19553
  • Numeric Keyboard NEEDS to have a close keypad or DONE button on it like the Return on the full keyboard. Android has it, iOS does not. #19550
  • If Maui use Shell, in android ,control cannot be placed at the top with immersive statusbar #19549

Closed

  • Null reference for jsRuntime in .net MAUI app with BlazorWebView #13293
  • Maui Preferences always thows exception while using datatype other than string. #17858
  • [UITEst] Windows Controls Unpackaged occasionally crashes with IndexOutOfRangeException #19463
    Backlog
  • UriImageSource and dependencies #13309
    Backlog
  • Maui SkiaSharp GetPoints Cause App Crash Intermittently in iPad. #19558
  • [Windows] No Property to hide 'Switch' Label #19551
  • Appended ToolbarHandler mapper action not called on iOS #16467
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Attach And Run iOS / catalyst semantic tests #19571
  • Add buttons to copy error messages and stack traces to the test runner #19566
  • [X] GetValueSource #19563
    do-not-merge

Merged

  • Fix attribute typo #19567
  • Grab device logs if app stops running #19562
  • Disable flaky compat test #19546
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-flakiness, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Break `ControlsHeadlessTestRunner.RunTestsAsync` method when discovering tests #19559
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing, testing-flakiness

Updated

  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, stale
  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢
  • Clean up async assertions #19385
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [net8.0] Update with main #19381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
